name: Robot Tower (Karo Games)
description:
Eliminate the evil sentry robots, and escape their 24 floors tall tower before they spot and kill you.

Instructions:

Each of 24 levels consists of two parts - shooting and running.

First, you need to shoot all the robots (aim moving a mouse and shoot with LMB) - you have 8 seconds in each level until you get spotted ans shot. Since your bullets bounce off the walls and can eliminate multiple targets, try to shoot as few as possible.

When all robots are down, the door to the next floor opens. Reach it using arrows but be careful! Now, all the bullets you fired in current level can harm you!

Good luck!
